title: Random Ward Each Game
body: I think having a system where you can have a random ward each game would be nice or placing a different ward every time you place one would be good as well. What i mean is it chooses a random ward skin that you own and it places it or it keeps a random ward skin each game. Maybe we can have a selection of what ward skin we want to use as well. I want this is because i feel like i own way to much ward skins and i never get to use some of them, because im either forget to change or i run out of time because i was afk doing something else.

replies.body:
Right?? How I long for a random ward and/or random skin option.

{{sticker:cass-cry}}
Totally agree! Takes the effort out of choosing
